languages.text: {n}Октавиана протягивает вам прозрачный стакан — возможно, самый прозрачный в данном заведении. От холодной воды ничем не пахнет — многие обитатели Футфола никогда в жизни не пили ничего подобного.{/n}

{n}Octaviana offers you a clear glass — probably the clearest one in this entire establishment. The cold water is odourless — something many Footfall residents have never experienced in their whole lives.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана протягивает вам прозрачный стакан — возможно, самый прозрачный в данном заведении. От холодной воды ничем не пахнет — многие обитатели Футфола никогда в жизни не пили ничего подобного.{/n}

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナが澄んだグラスを差し出す。おそらくここでは最も綺麗なものだろう。冷たい水は無臭―多くのフットフォール住民がこれまでの人生で飲んだことのないものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you a clear glass — probably the clearest one in this entire establishment. The cold water is odourless — something many Footfall residents have never experienced in their whole lives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナが澄んだグラスを差し出す。おそらくここでは最も綺麗なものだろう。冷たい水は無臭―多くのフットフォール住民がこれまでの人生で飲んだことのないものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana vous sert un verre de liquide clair, sans doute le plus limpide de tout son établissement. L'eau fraîche n'a aucune odeur, contrairement à celle que doivent boire un grand nombre des habitants de Castel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you a clear glass — probably the clearest one in this entire establishment. The cold water is odourless — something many Footfall residents have never experienced in their whole lives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana vous sert un verre de liquide clair, sans doute le plus limpide de tout son établissement. L'eau fraîche n'a aucune odeur, contrairement à celle que doivent boire un grand nombre des habitants de Castel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜给你倒了一杯清澈的水，很可能是整间酒吧里最干净的水。这杯冰凉的水没有任何异味，落脚港许多居民一辈子都没尝过这样的味道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you a clear glass — probably the clearest one in this entire establishment. The cold water is odourless — something many Footfall residents have never experienced in their whole lives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜给你倒了一杯清澈的水，很可能是整间酒吧里最干净的水。这杯冰凉的水没有任何异味，落脚港许多居民一辈子都没尝过这样的味道。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana reicht dir ein durchsichtiges Glas –wahrscheinlich das durchsichtigste, das es hier überhaupt gibt. Das kalte Wasser hat keinen Geruch – etwas, das viele Bewohner von Footfall in ihrem ganzen Leben noch nie erlebt haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you a clear glass — probably the clearest one in this entire establishment. The cold water is odourless — something many Footfall residents have never experienced in their whole lives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana reicht dir ein durchsichtiges Glas –wahrscheinlich das durchsichtigste, das es hier überhaupt gibt. Das kalte Wasser hat keinen Geruch – etwas, das viele Bewohner von Footfall in ihrem ganzen Leben noch nie erlebt haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana te ofrece un vaso limpio, probablemente el más limpio del bar. El agua fría que contiene es inodora, algo que muchos residentes de Paso no han experimentado en su vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you a clear glass — probably the clearest one in this entire establishment. The cold water is odourless — something many Footfall residents have never experienced in their whole lives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana te ofrece un vaso limpio, probablemente el más limpio del bar. El agua fría que contiene es inodora, algo que muchos residentes de Paso no han experimentado en su vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Octaviana sana temiz bir bardak çıkarıyor. Muhtemelen koca müessesedeki en temiz bardak budur. Soğuk suyun hiçbir tadı yok. Binliman sakinlerinin çoğu, herhâlde ömürleri boyunda böyle bir şey içmemiştir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana offers you a clear glass — probably the clearest one in this entire establishment. The cold water is odourless — something many Footfall residents have never experienced in their whole lives.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana sana temiz bir bardak çıkarıyor... Muhtemelen koca bardaki en temiz bardak budur. Bardaktaki suyun hiçbir tadı yok: Binliman sakinlerinin pek çoğu, asla böyle bir deneyim yaşamadı.{/n}
